name: Media Bar (Remove Streaming Items)
description: A beautiful featured content carousel for Jellyfin that displays media items in a slideshow format on the home page
overview: Featured content carousel with slideshow capabilities

versions.changelog:
Updated to support 10.11.1

- Support for Jellyfin 10.11.1
- Featured content carousel
- Custom playlist support
- Configurable slideshow settings
- Mobile and desktop responsive design
